La candidata a la Alcaldía de Suárez, departamento del Cauca (Colombia), Karina García Sierra fue asesinada junto a otras cinco personas mientras se desplazaba en un vehículo.
Más información, en breve.

articles.author: RT
articles.title: ‘I don’t want to go, help!’ Video of small boy goes viral as school year begins in Russia
articles.description: The start of the school year proved too much for one schoolboy who tried to avoid a return to the classroom in a video by screaming: “I don’t want to, I can’t write!” as his parents dragged him down the street. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content:
“No, I don’t want to go to school!” he whimpered, but his hopes of swaying his parents quickly faded. As the tragedy unfolded, the adults tried to play ‘good cop, bad cop.’
“They will teach you [how to write], you’ll be doing your homework,” the woman said, … [+859 chars]

articles.title: Japan plans to launch ‘police unit’ for disputed islands in E. China Sea
articles.description: Tokyo will launch a special police unit equipped with submachine guns and helicopters to patrol disputed isles in the East China Sea, police and media said on Monday.
articles.content: Tokyo will launch a special police unit, equipped with submachine guns and helicopters, to patrol disputed islands in the East China Sea, police and media said on Monday. The deployment near the tiny islands, known as the 'Senkakus' in Japan and the 'Diaoyu' … [+709 chars]

articles.title: China protesta ante EE.UU. por la introducción de aranceles adicionales
articles.description: Desde el 1 de septiembre, importaciones chinas a EE.UU. por valor de 300.000 millones de dólares se gravarán con un 15 % en vez de con un 10 %.
articles.content:
Pekín ha protestado de manera enérgica ante Estados Unidos por introducir aranceles adicionales sobre los productos chinos a partir del pasado 1 de septiembre, según ha comunicado el Ministerio de Comercio de China.
